content:
It’s no secret why Celino’s Iconic hotel, suites, lofts and bedrooms have been a South Beach playground since the 1940s. Surrounded by lush gardens and a palm lined pool, our lodgings channel an ineffable romance. (We’re also attuned to the reality that you may never want to leave).

Please note that our rooms are ADA compliant under the Department of Justice ADA Title III Regulation 28 CFR Part 36, 1991. ADA rooms are available. We also invite you to view our Accessibility Statement.
